ygData.subject: Re: Magical adventure in North Freeport :)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... WARNING! If a GM sees you up there, he may think you are using a known exploit.  (No, I will not divulge the nature of the exploit).  Consider yerselves
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:58 PM 9/1/99 -0600, you wrote:
>
> While in Northern Freeport a friend of mine related an amazing discovery of
> his to me. it is possible to get up onto the Walls, running throughout North
> Freeport :). It is also possible to jump all gaps in the wall if you have
> Selo's blasting and the drum on.
>
> To get up there you have to Enter the Jade Tiger Inn, that is opposite
> the Bank. then you go up the stairs and enter the first room on the right,
> and jump up on the balcony railing, then onto the wall :).
>
> You don't have to worry about falling under the world up there, because there
> is a zone border that stops you, although I would be careful....
>
> Now, go off and confuse everyone by jumping on top of the bank, and running
> along the walls :).
>



WARNING! If a GM sees you up there, he may think you are using a known
exploit. (No, I will not divulge the nature of the exploit). Consider
yerselves warned, you nosy curious explorer-types (wait.... that like,
perfectly defines Bards.... Go fig.)

Talies the Wanderer
(Who is absolutely POSITIVELY not taking a trip to Freeport tonight. Nope. Not
a bit.)
